languages.text: Перед Лорд-капитаном встает непростой выбор: помочь эльдарам, как того просит Ирлиэт, или же встать на сторону собрата Вольного Торговца. Но есть и третий путь — примирить врагов и попытаться решить конфликт мирно.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.
languages.original_text: Перед Лорд-капитаном встает непростой выбор: помочь эльдарам, как того просит Ирлиэт, или же встать на сторону собрата Вольного Торговца. Но есть и третий путь — примирить врагов и попытаться решить конфликт мирно.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit faire un choix délicat : aider les Aeldaris à la demande d'Yrliet ou bien prendre le parti d'un autre libre-marchand. Cependant, une troisième voie s'offre à {mf|lui|elle} : agir en qualité de {mf|médiateur|médiatrice} entre les parties adverses pour tenter de résoudre le conflit sans effusion de sang.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit faire un choix délicat : aider les Aeldaris à la demande d'Yrliet ou bien prendre le parti d'un autre libre-marchand. Cependant, une troisième voie s'offre à {mf|lui|elle} : agir en qualité de {mf|médiateur|médiatrice} entre les parties adverses pour tenter de résoudre le conflit sans effusion de sang.

languages.text: 行商浪人面临着艰难的选择：是按照伊莉耶特的要求协助艾达灵族？还是与另一位行商浪人结为同盟？不过，还有第三条道路——想办法在对立双方之间进行斡旋，以尽可能不产生流血冲突的方式解决这场争端。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人面临着艰难的选择：是按照伊莉耶特的要求协助艾达灵族？还是与另一位行商浪人结为同盟？不过，还有第三条道路——想办法在对立双方之间进行斡旋，以尽可能不产生流血冲突的方式解决这场争端。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、ユリエットの要請を受けてアエルダリを助けるか、それとも自由開拓者の仲間の味方をするか、難しい選択を迫られている。しかし第3の選択肢もある。対立する双方の調停役となり、できるだけ血を流さずに紛争を解決するのだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、ユリエットの要請を受けてアエルダリを助けるか、それとも自由開拓者の仲間の味方をするか、難しい選択を迫られている。しかし第3の選択肢もある。対立する双方の調停役となり、できるだけ血を流さずに紛争を解決するのだ。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain steht vor einer schwierigen Entscheidung: Yrliets Bitte erfüllen und den Aeldari helfen, oder sich auf die Seite eines anderen Freihändlers schlagen. Es gibt jedoch noch einen dritten Pfad: Als {mf|Mittler|Mittlerin} zwischen den beiden Parteien fungieren und versuchen, den Konflikt mit möglichst wenig Blutvergießen beizulegen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain steht vor einer schwierigen Entscheidung: Yrliets Bitte erfüllen und den Aeldari helfen, oder sich auf die Seite eines anderen Freihändlers schlagen. Es gibt jedoch noch einen dritten Pfad: Als {mf|Mittler|Mittlerin} zwischen den beiden Parteien fungieren und versuchen, den Konflikt mit möglichst wenig Blutvergießen beizulegen.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se enfrenta a una difícil elección: ayudar a los Aeldari como le pide Yrliet o apoyar a otro Comerciante Independiente. Pero existe una tercera vía: intentar mediar en el conflicto para evitar el derramamiento de sangre.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se enfrenta a una difícil elección: ayudar a los Aeldari como le pide Yrliet o apoyar a otro Comerciante Independiente. Pero existe una tercera vía: intentar mediar en el conflicto para evitar el derramamiento de sangre.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, zor bir seçimle karşı karşıya: Ya Yrliet'in isteğini gerçekleştirerek Aeldarilere yardım edecek ya da dost bir Hür Tacir'in tarafını tutacak. Fakat seçebileceği üçüncü bir yol daha var: Taraflar arasında ara bulucu görevi üstlenerek olayı kan dökülmeden çözmeye çalışmak.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to help the Aeldari per Yrliet's request or to side with a fellow Rogue Trader. But there is a third path: to act as a mediator between the opposing sides and attempt to resolve the conflict with as little bloodshed as possible.
